name: UBX-NAV-RELPOSNED-V1
description: Relative positioning information in NED frame. This message contains the relative position vector from the reference station to the rover, including accuracy figures, in the local topological system defined at the reference station. The NED frame is defined as the local topological system at the reference station. The relative position vector components in this message, along with their associated accuracies, are given in that local topological system.

fields.name: version
fields.description: Message version (0x01 for this version)

fields.name: reserved0
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: refStationId
fields.description: Reference station ID. Must be in the range 0..4095.

fields.name: iTOW
fields.description: GPS time of week of the navigation epoch.

fields.name: relPosN
fields.description: North component of relative position vector (Scale: cm)

fields.name: relPosE
fields.description: East component of relative position vector (Scale: cm)

fields.name: relPosD
fields.description: Down component of relative position vector (Scale: cm)

fields.name: relPosLength
fields.description: Length of the relative position vector (Scale: cm)

fields.name: relPosHeading
fields.description: Heading of the relative position vector (Scale: 1e-5 deg)

fields.name: reserved1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: relPosHPN
fields.description: High-precision North component of relative position vector. Must be in the range -99 to +99. The full North component of the relative position vector, in units of cm, is given by relPosN + (relPosHPN * 1e-2) (Scale: 0.1 mm)

fields.name: relPosHPE
fields.description: High-precision East component of relative position vector. Must be in the range -99 to +99. The full East component of the relative position vector, in units of cm, is given by relPosE + (relPosHPE * 1e-2) (Scale: 0.1 mm)

fields.name: relPosHPD
fields.description: High-precision Down component of relative position vector. Must be in the range -99 to +99. The full Down component of the relative position vector, in units of cm, is given by relPosD + (relPosHPD * 1e-2) (Scale: 0.1 mm)

fields.name: relPosHPLength
fields.description: High-precision component of the length of the relative position vector. Must be in the range -99 to +99. The full length of the relative position vector, in units of cm, is given by relPosLength + (relPosHPLength * 1e-2) (Scale: 0.1 mm)

fields.name: accN
fields.description: Accuracy of relative position North component (Scale: 0.1 mm)

fields.name: accE
fields.description: Accuracy of relative position East component (Scale: 0.1 mm)

fields.name: accD
fields.description: Accuracy of relative position Down component (Scale: 0.1 mm)

fields.name: accLength
fields.description: Accuracy of length of the relative position vector (Scale: 0.1 mm)

fields.name: accHeading
fields.description: Accuracy of heading of the relative position vector (Scale: 1e-5 deg)

fields.name: reserved2
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: flags
fields.description: Flags. Bit 0 (gnssFixOK): A valid fix (i.e. within DOP & accuracy masks). Bit 1 (diffSoln): 1 if differential corrections were applied. Bit 2 (relPosValid): 1 if relative position components and accuracies are valid and, in moving base mode only, if baseline is valid. Bits 3-4 (carrSoln): Carrier phase range solution status (0 = no carrier phase range solution, 1 = carrier phase range solution with floating ambiguities).
